bill.title: An Act Concerning A Green Economy And Environmental Protection.
bill.description: To authorize the procurement of energy derived from anaerobic digestion and to require the Secretary of the Office of Policy and Management to study the return on investment from fully implementing certain provisions of the general statutes.
